alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 1:14PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Calhoun County through 145 PM CDT... At 113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seadrift, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Point Comfort, Alamo Beach, Olivia, Green Lake, Indianola, Magnolia Beach, Schicke Point and Long Mott. This includes US Highway 87 between mile markers 836 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
